001package org.nasdanika.ncore.util;
002
003import java.io.IOException;
004import java.io.InputStream;
005import java.io.InputStreamReader;
006import java.io.Reader;
007import java.net.URL;
008import java.nio.charset.Charset;
009import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
010import java.util.ArrayList;
011import java.util.HashSet;
012
013import org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI;
014import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject;
015import org.json.JSONArray;
016import org.json.JSONObject;
017import org.json.JSONTokener;
018
019/**
020 * Registry of semantic identities with methods to find by another identity, UUID, and URI
021 * @author Pavel
022 *
023 */
024public class SemanticRegistry extends ArrayList<SemanticIdentity> {
025        
026// Override these methods to implement indexing by identifiers          
027//      @Override
028//      public boolean addAll(Collection<? extends SemanticIdentity> c) {
029//              return super.addAll(c);
030//      }
031//      
032//      @Override
033//      public org.nasdanika.ncore.util.SemanticIdentity set(int index, org.nasdanika.ncore.util.SemanticIdentity element) {
034//              return super.set(index, element);
035//      }
036//      
037//      @Override
038//      public void add(int index, org.nasdanika.ncore.util.SemanticIdentity element) {
039//              // TODO Auto-generated method stub
040//              super.add(index, element);
041//      }
042//      
043//      @Override
044//      public boolean remove(Object o) {
045//              // TODO Auto-generated method stub
046//              return super.remove(o);
047//      }
048        
049        /**
050         * 
051         */
052        private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
053
054        /**
055         * Find identity in the registry by another identity as a key 
056         * @param key
057         * @return
058         */
059        public SemanticIdentity find(EObject eObj) {
060                return find(SemanticIdentity.of(eObj));
061        }
062
063        /**
064         * Find identity in the registry by another identity as a key 
065         * @param key
066         * @return
067         */
068        public SemanticIdentity find(SemanticIdentity key) {
069                if (key == null) {
070                        return null;
071                }
072                for (URI identifier: key.getIdentifiers()) {
073                        SemanticIdentity ret = find(identifier);
074                        if (ret != null) {
075                                return ret;
076                        }
077                }
078                return null;
079        }
080        
081        /**
082         * Find identity in the registry by UUID
083         * @param key
084         * @return
085         */
086        public SemanticIdentity find(URI identifier) {
087                if (identifier != null) {
088                        for (SemanticIdentity e: this) {
089                                if (e.getIdentifiers().contains(identifier)) {
090                                        return e;
091                                }
092                        }
093                }
094                return null;            
095        }
096        
097        /**
098         * Loads semantic identities from {@link JSONArray}. 
099         * Array elements are loaded as {@link SemanticIdentity} if they have only uris and uuid keys.
100         * If they have any other keys, they are loaded as {@link SemanticInfo} 
101         * @param jsonData
102         * @param Base {@link URI} to resolve locations in semantic info
103         */
104        public void load(JSONArray jsonData, URI base) {
105                for (Object je: jsonData) {
106                        if (je instanceof JSONObject) {
107                                JSONObject jo = (JSONObject) je;
108                                HashSet<String> keySet = new HashSet<>(jo.keySet());
109                                keySet.remove(SemanticIdentityImpl.IDENTIFIERS_KEY);
110                                if (keySet.isEmpty()) {
111                                        add(new SemanticIdentityImpl(jo));
112                                } else {
113                                        add(new SemanticInfo(jo, base));
114                                }
115                        }
116                }
117        }
118                
119        /**
120         * Parses a string a JSONArray and loads
121         * @param str JSON array string
122         * @param Base {@link URI} to resolve locations in semantic info
123         * @return
124         */
125        public void load(String str, URI base) {
126                JSONArray jsonArray = new JSONArray(new JSONTokener(str));
127                load(jsonArray, base);
128        }
129        
130        public void load(InputStream in, URI base) throws IOException {
131                try (Reader reader = new InputStreamReader(in, getCharset())) {
132                        load(reader,  base);
133                }
134        }
135        
136        public void load(Reader reader, URI base) {
137                JSONArray jsonArray = new JSONArray(new JSONTokener(reader));
138                load(jsonArray, base);
139        }
140        
141        public void load(URL url) throws IOException {
142                load(url.openStream(), URI.createURI(url.toString()));
143        }       
144        
145        public JSONArray toJSON(int indent) {
146                JSONArray ret = new JSONArray();
147                for (SemanticIdentity e: this) {
148                        if (e instanceof SemanticIdentityImpl) {
149                                ret.put(((SemanticIdentityImpl) e).toJSON());
150                        }
151                }
152                return ret;
153        }       
154        
155        /**
156         * Override to customize charset.
157         * @return
158         */
159        protected Charset getCharset() {
160                return StandardCharsets.UTF_8;
161        }
162        
163
164}
